properties.entry: INSERT INTO ROOM ( ROOM_NO, REGION_NO, ROOM_SIZE, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_ADDRESS, PRICE, USE_NIGHT, PARKING, EATING, STATUS ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, 'Y' )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( FILE_NO, ROOM_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, UPLOAD_DATE, FILE_LEVEL, STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE, ?, 'Y' )
SELECT REGION_NO, REGION_NAME FROM REGION ORDER BY REGION_NO

SELECT b.region_name AS regionName, A.*, C.FILE_PATH || C.CHANGE_NAME AS TITLE_IMG FROM ROOM A, REGION B, ATTACHMENT C WHERE 1=1 AND A.region_no = B.region_no AND A.ROOM_NO = C.ROOM_NO AND A.STATUS = 'Y' AND C.FILE_LEVEL = 1
SELECT * FROM ROOM WHERE ROOM_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE ROOM_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY FILE_LEVEL
